title: Bloomberg Markets: Brandes on Passive Investing Bubble
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Brandes on Passive Investing Bubble
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Charles H Brandes\u0010Chairman\u0010Brandes Investment Partners \u0010Discussing his concern about a potential bubble forming in passive investing, and that the trend to passive investing may stimulate unintended consequences if prices adjust.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
